column4: That is true.  I wish Cedega wasn't such a annoying, subscription-based thing.
it doesn't work with all cards though
Maybe not, but it works on a lot.  It worked on mine.  Certainly it is worth a shot.
you mean the codename like breezy?
again, a little, but not much
I like version numbers or year numbers to be honest.
yeah, but no one ever uses them.  They just use breezy or hoary or something.  I can never remember which one I have.
lsb_release will tell you what you have
ah.  Still, the names are just kind of silly
